response.summary: Chemical engineer with strengths in process modeling, data analysis, and project evaluation. He has 8 years of experience in consultancy and advisory in the energy sector (oil, natural gas, and electricity) and public services (electricity, natural gas, and massive urban passenger transport). He has skills in mathematical modeling and in the use of computational tools for statistical analysis and mathematical programming.
response.skills: Process Simulation, Ingeniería química, Ingeniería de procesos, Planificación estratégica, Chemical Engineering, Process Engineering, Process Control, CFD, Control de procesos, Simulación de procesos, Optimización de procesos, Aspen HYSYS, Aspen Plus, Plant Design, Heterogeneous Catalysis, Homogeneous Catalysis, Data Analysis, Analytical Skills, Python (Programming Language), Stata

profile_positions.description:

Model for determination of efficient cost for the provision of the electric energy service through attention to users through centralized or individual isolated solutions.
Duties:
o Statistical analysis
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Participation in the projects
- Feasibility study for a 100 MW power plant petcoke based at El Salvador
- CIER 18 International Benchmarking of Systems operation 1° phase contracted by CIER (commission of regional electrical integration). This study had the participation of companies from Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Panamá, Perú, Dominican Republic y Uruguay
- CIER 14 International Benchmarking of AOM cost in power plants 2° phase” contracted by CIER (commission of regional electrical integration).This study had the participation of different kind of power generation such as Wind, Geothermic, Hydraulic, Thermal from Latin America
- CIER 11 International Benchmarking of AOM cost in electricity transmission companies 5° phase contracted by CIER (commission of regional electrical integration). This study had the participation of companies from Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Costa Rica, MER, México, Panamá, Perú, Dominican Republic y Uruguay.
- Internal Benchmarking for TGI. The objective was to compare the productivity index for compress stations and gas ducts districts.
- Feasibility study for solar energy in OCELOTE oil field
- Feasibility study for self-generation using natural gas in oil fields placed at Magdalena region
- Support to Transmilenio S.A. in the following projects in regulation, cost estimation (CAPEX and OPEX), efficiency analysis
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Participation in the project:
Estimation of the available capacity of cogeneration and self-generation in Colombia". This project was done for Mining and Energy Planning Unit – UPME

o Statistical estimation of the potential for self-generation and cogeneration in Colombia for industrial, oil, public and commercial sectors.
o Technologies Competitiveness and energy sources of cogeneration and self-generation projects.

school.name: Colegio Parroquial Santa Isabel de Hungría

company.name: HART ENERGY & CONTROL CONSULTING SAS
company.description:
HART-ECC (antes KEMA SAS) inició operaciones en Colombia en 1996 como una filial de KEMA Inc., consultora reconocida a nivel mundial en el sector de la energía eléctrica, atendiendo desde entonces las necesidades de diferentes clientes en los países de habla hispana en América Latina.Posteriormente, y como consecuencia de los cambios y transiciones de propiedad presentados en el sector durante los últimos años, la casa matriz tomó la decisión de enfocar su plan de negocios en otras regiones. Creándose una oportunidad de emprendimiento de los ingenieros consultores locales para tomar el control de la empresa en la región.
Esto permitió aprovechar el conocimiento y experiencia obtenidos en los proyectos exitosos desarrollados en la región y continuar con la su oferta de servicios por los que ha sido reconocida y a su vez proponer otros servicios innovadores contextualizados y hechos a la medida de las necesidades de sus clientes en el ámbito cambiante en que desarrollan sus actividades.
De este modo HART ECC emerge como una empresa con propuestas y altas competencias.
